script.name: plugin.X2I.HephCorp.bringbeacon
script.description: delivers jump beacon to building place
script.sourceplaintext:
* delivers jump beacon within range of 20 km to building place, * so TL can directly jump to it $page.id = get global variable: name='HephaistosCorp.globvar.pageid' do if $page.id == null return null
$owner = Friendly Race $current.build.info.arr.name = read text: page=$page.id id=6 $current.build.info.arr = get global variable: name=$current.build.info.arr.name $x = $pos.arr[0] $y = $pos.arr[1] $z = $pos.arr[2] $sector = $pos.arr[3]
* get precision for move.to command $sector.owner = $sector -> get sector if $sector.owner == Terran $precision = 20000 else $precision = 15000 end
$engine.version = script engine version if $engine.version >= 50 $jb.ware = Jump Beacon $jb.type = Jump Beacon else $jb.ware = Jumpdrive Components $jb.type = Jump Beacon end
* overall counter checks, how often jump beacon delivery was not successful * abborts delivering and building process after 5 tries
$destroyed.counter = 0 * create and equip ship create.ship: $shiptype.arr = get ship type array: maker race=Terran class=M4 if find Drone Sentinel in array: $shiptype.arr $index = get index of Drone Sentinel in array $shiptype.arr offset=-1 + 1 remove element from array $shiptype.arr at index $index end $size.shiptype.arr = size of array $shiptype.arr $random = random value from 0 to $size.shiptype.arr - 1 $shiptype = $shiptype.arr[$random] $start.station = find station in galaxy: startsector=$sector class or type=Shipyard race=null flags=null refobj=null serial=null max.jumps=null $ship = create ship: type=$shiptype owner=Friendly Race addto=$start.station x=0 y=0 z=0 @ $ship = [THIS] -> call script lib.X2I.HephCorp.installequip : ship to equip=$ship cargo:0,engine:1,rudder:2,all:3=3 $pilot.name = get random name: race=Terran $ship ->set pilot name to $pilot.name $ship.name = read text: page=$page.id id=15 $ship ->set name to $ship.name $ship ->add shields per value:100 $ship ->set capture disabled: [TRUE] $ship ->set pilot morale: 30 = $ship -> install 1 units of Fight Command Software MK1 = $ship -> install 1 units of Fight Command Software MK2 = $ship -> install 1 units of Jumpdrive = $ship -> install 1 units of Navigation Command Software MK1 = $ship -> install 1 units of Triplex Scanner = $ship -> install 1 units of Cargo Bay Shielding = $ship -> add 1 units of $jb.ware = $ship -> add 10 units of Energy Cells $ship ->add lasers per value:100 flags:100
skip if $jump.target -> exists @ $jump.target = [THIS] -> call script lib.X2I.HephCorp.findgate : position.arr=$pos.arr
* different jump methods for TC and AP needed * jump and move to target position if $engine.version >= 50 $return = $ship -> use jump drive: target=$jump.target else if $jump.target -> is of type Jump Beacon $jump.target.pos.arr = $jump.target -> get position as array $jump.target.x = $jump.target.pos.arr[0] $jump.target.y = $jump.target.pos.arr[1] $jump.target.z = $jump.target.pos.arr[2] $jump.target.sector = $jump.target -> get sector $return = $ship -> use jump drive: target=$jump.target.sector $ship ->set position: x=$jump.target.x y=$jump.target.y z=$jump.target.z else $return = $ship -> use jump drive: target=$jump.target end end
@ = wait 10 ms
move.to: @ START $ship -> call script !move.movetoposition : sector=$sector position x=$x position y=$y position z=$z precision=$precision
$current.build.info.arr[4] = 'deliver.jb' set global variable: name=$current.build.info.arr.name value=$current.build.info.arr
$counter = 0 * check if ship still moves and if it has reached target position $ship.sector = $ship -> get sector $jump.distance = get jumps from sector $ship.sector to sector $sector $in.sector.distance = $ship -> get distance to: x=$x y=$y z=$z while [TRUE] $old.jump.distance = $jump.distance $old.distance = $in.sector.distance @ = wait 30000 ms $ship.sector = $ship -> get sector $jump.distance = get jumps from sector $ship.sector to sector $sector $in.sector.distance = $ship -> get distance to: x=$x y=$y z=$z * ship was destroyed skip if $ship -> exists break * ship was captured $owner = $ship -> get owner race skip if $owner == Friendly Race break * target reached if $ship.sector == $sector AND $in.sector.distance <= $precision break else if $jump.distance == $old.jump.distance AND $in.sector.distance == $old.distance inc $counter = * ship hasn't moved for 2 minutes, restart move-script do if $counter > 4 goto label move.to end end
skip if $owner == Friendly Race $ship ->destruct: show no explosion=[FALSE]
if $ship -> exists $ship.sector = $ship -> get sector do if $ship.sector != $sector OR $distance > $precision goto label move.to else inc $destroyed.counter = if $destroyed.counter <= 5 $current.build.info.arr[4] = 'deliver.jb.destroyed' set global variable: name=$current.build.info.arr.name value=$current.build.info.arr @ = wait 180000 ms goto label create.ship else * abbort building and delivery process return 'abbort' end end
* create jump beacon and jump ship away $x.ship = $ship -> get x position $y.ship = $ship -> get y position $z.ship = $ship -> get z position = $ship -> add -1 units of $jb.ware $return.jump.target = create ship: type=$jb.type owner=Friendly Race addto=$sector x=$x.ship y=$y.ship z=$z.ship $loc.var.jb.name = read text: page=$page.id id=9 $return.jump.target ->set local variable: name=$loc.var.jb.name value='HephCorp.jb'
* jumpout and destroy ship, should equal a short wait * random sector will always be start sector, if this sector is gateless * end search for random sector after 5 tries $counter2 = 5 $random.sector = find a random sector: startsector=$sector, jumps=50, owner=null while $random.sector == $sector AND $counter2 > 0 $random.sector = find a random sector: startsector=$sector, jumps=50, owner=null dec $counter2 = @ = wait 10 ms end
$return = $ship -> use jump drive: target=$random.sector $ship ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] @ = wait 10000 ms
return $return.jump.target
* author: X2-Illuminatus * 19.04.2012 - release for HephCorp version 0.71
